name: nonhomologous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a chromosome) not containing similar information to another chromosome that it forms a pair with during meiosis (= a type of cell division), or involving such chromosomes: Nonhomologous chromosomes, such as XY sex chromosomes, have alleles on different genes. Nonhomologous end joining is a repair mechanism that occurs in DNA.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a nonhomologous sequence at one end of the DNA strand.In vitro studies have provided evidence for various forms of non-homologous recombination in these viruses and subsequent increased virulence.
